052e2aa40ccee153f0b9934982fae74f9945e20f.query:
INSERT INTO users (id, slack_id, name, email)
    VALUES($1,$2,$3,$4)
    ON CONFLICT (slack_id)
        DO NOTHING;

17e465839b16cfe389bdd3d027304bd804dbebfb.query:
SELECT ao, date
        FROM back_blasts
        WHERE bb_type = 'backblast' AND active = true AND date >= $1
        ORDER BY date DESC;

286f1afdaeb32bc417262c2dbbdb58d71de6586a.query:
INSERT INTO ao_list (id, name, days, channel_id, active)
    VALUES($1,$2,$3,$4,$5)
    ON CONFLICT (name)
    DO NOTHING;

43bdd8d1d5e1769c5ae142f6a8c6b7fb75796713.query:
WITH list_view AS (
        SELECT
            al.name as ao,
            string_to_array(lower(q), ',') as q,
            string_to_array(lower(pax), ',') as pax,
            date,
            bb_type,
            bb.channel_id
        FROM back_blasts bb
        INNER JOIN ao_list al on bb.channel_id = al.channel_id
        WHERE bb.bb_type = 'backblast' AND bb.active = true
    )
    
    SELECT ao, channel_id, q as "q!", pax as "pax!", date, bb_type
    FROM list_view 
    WHERE pax @> array[$1]
    ORDER BY date DESC;

a82fab2c6d84945c51438aad27aa0a0b7729e844.query:
SELECT slack_id, name, email
        FROM users;

c7e186250ede869eba2642f1bc59fe9f03625879.query:
WITH list_view AS (
        SELECT
            al.name as ao,
            string_to_array(lower(q), ',') as q,
            string_to_array(lower(pax), ',') as pax,
            date,
            bb_type,
            bb.channel_id
        FROM back_blasts bb
        INNER JOIN ao_list al on bb.channel_id = al.channel_id
        WHERE bb.bb_type = 'backblast' AND bb.active = true
    )
    
    SELECT ao, channel_id, q as "q!", pax as "pax!", date, bb_type
    FROM list_view 
    ORDER BY date DESC;

d821e3fd93247e6c85dc55a3ea0239c6901220c0.query:
INSERT INTO back_blasts (id, ao, q, pax, date, bb_type, channel_id, active)
    VALUES($1,$2,$3,$4,$5,$6,$7,$8)
    ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT back_blasts_channel_id_date_bb_type_key
        DO NOTHING;
